__e: - Okay, but don't forget to tell me everything.

Don't forget to leave a message for the card in the box!!
- Here. Don't forget there's still some of your things in the car.
I can't stop thinking, if they hadn't killed that mare of his, things would have been different, he would be here now.
But you just remember that your daddy loves you very much and that I love you very much, even though we're not here.
You may be too young to understand, but hear me out anyway.
If you are good, it's because I've been hanging around to keep you from breaking your fool neck.
But you just remember that your daddy loves you very much and that I love you very much, even though we're not here.

Hey, Maxie, everywhere you go, I go too. Remember that.

I never forget a face, my good man.
Oh, yes, indeedy. I never forget a face.
